name: Giving
description:
You are testing new Santa technology, the jet powered sleigh. The elf's has figured out that you will not how time to stop and land on every house, so they have installed a dropping system. The elf's will score you on the height and accuracy of your deliveries.

You have to fly over the city and drop gifts down chimney, but look out for all the pesky drones that fly around.

Colliding will cause you to drop gifts, so be careful. If gifts bunch they take damage and will lose values.

Some gifts are heavier than the other, so keep an eye on wrapping paper.

I made this game by myself except from the audio parts which I used assets pack I already owned and a WebGL template I found in the Unity asset store. Here are links to those:

https://johnleonardfrench.com/ultimate-game-music-collection/

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/responsive-webgl-template-117308

Programs I used:

  • Unity 2019
  • Visual Studio
  • Paint.net

I had fun making this game and I hope you have fun playing it.
